menu_items.name: test
menu_items.detail:
Join us for an evening with Tablas Creek wines and creatively curated courses by Chef Chris Sayre
7pm Welcome wine and hor d'oeuvres
7:30pmintroduction and first course served
$110 per person - 21+ only
Limited seating
*gratuity not included in ticket price

HORS D'OEUVRES
Picpoul Blanc
mousse of smoked trout and green apple on fennel seed lavash with jicama

FIRST COURSE
Patelin de Tablas Blanc
roasted carrots, parsnips, salsify and turnips with honey blue cheese emulsion, baby kale and walnuts

SECOND COURSE
Patelin de Tablas
kurabuta pork belly with grilled eggplant caponata and pine nuts

THIRD COURSE
Espirit de Tablas & Espirit de Beaucastel
pheasant and wile mushroom pot pie with celery root puree and pheasant demi-glace

FOURTH COURSE
Vin de Paille
sticky toffee pudding with orange ginger ice cream and cardamom pecan brittle

PHOTOGRAPHY RELEASE
When you attend this event, you are entering an area where photography, video, audio recording may take place. By attending, you consent to such recording and its release, distribution or reproduction for use in advertising, promotion, web casting and televising. 

BUY TICKETS >
